original_text: The servant was still praying when Rebekah came to the well. She had her pot on her shoulder. Rebekah was the daughter of Bethuel, who was the son of Milcah. Milcah was the wife of Abraham's brother, Nahor.
korean_text: 말을 마치기도 전에 리브가가 물동이를 어깨에 메고 나오니 그는 아브라함의 동생 나홀의 아내 밀가의 아들 브두엘의 소생이라

sentences.original_text: when Rebekah came to the well
She had her pot on her shoulder
Rebekah was the daughter of Bethuel
who was the son of Milcah
Milcah was the wife of Abraham's brother, Nahor
